title: cannot modify header information warnings while upgrading from 4.5.13 to 5.0.8
body:
### expected behaviour
no warnings should be shown during the upgrade process.

### actual behaviour
some warnings are shown during the upgrade process from oc 4.5.13 to 5.0.8 in the owncloud.log. i can't remember if i was logged into oc before or if i have logged out before i've started the upgrade process.

### steps to reproduce
1. have a running oc 4.5.13
2. delete all existing files except config.php and /data in the oc folder
3. copy the new files of oc 5.0.8 to the owncloud dir
4. started the upgrade process with opening my oc url

### server configuration
operating system: debian

web server: nginx

database: mysql

php version: 5.4.x

owncloud version: 4.5.13 to 5.0.8

### client configuration
browser: firefox 22

operating system: ubuntu

### logs
#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
    {"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:70) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#653","level":2,"time":1373456165}
    {"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:70) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#654","level":2,"time":1373456165}
    {"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:70) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#655","level":2,"time":1373456165}
